featured.text: After the band played an introduction, Wesla Whitfield wheeled herself onstage in a wheelchair.
Although Maggie has been physically _____ to her wheelchair since the car accident, she does not limit herself to indoor activities.
Completely wheelchair-accessible, the park features 25 acres of attractions including rides, playgrounds, a catch-and-release fishing lake, and picnic areas throughout the park.
The rides are custom- designed to accommodate wheelchair riders so that every family member can enjoy the fun.
As she sang, Whitfield’s voice was so powerful and soulful that everyone in the room forgot the wheelchair was even there.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於幫助行動不便者移動的座椅，通常有輪子。
definition.en_def: A chair on wheels used to assist individuals with mobility impairments in moving around.
definition.example: She uses a wheelchair to get around the city.
